amendment.description: Page 47, line 10, after "heading" insert the following: "at least $10,000,000 shall be for Buffer Zone Protection ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to place instructions in the bill on the appropriation of certain funds.

action.text: Mr. Carter raised a point of order against the Richardson amendment (A019). Mr. Carter stated that the amendment seeks to provide funds for programs not yet authorized. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Ms. Richardson.
